reviews.review_msg: AMAZING, SUPPORTIVE, HELPFUL, CLEAR, ENTHUSIASTIC, HONEST, SYMPATHETIC AND TOTALLY INTRIGUING - KEEPS YOU ON YOUR TOES, WITH HUMOUR AND LIGHT-HEARTEDNESS, AND UNDENIABLE PASSION FOR CONTEMPORARY ART AND CULTURE! BEST PROF. IN ART AND CULTURE IN CANADA! I LOVE HER! SHE PARTIES LIKE A ROCKSTAR!

very intelligent, approachable and respectful.  whoever said she is 'ultra-conservative' is just judging her on her appearance - she is very socially progressive and open-minded. my favourite prof at sfu.
very informative, engaging field trips to museums and walking tours gave a much more tactile expernce of art than strictly reading from the book.
